verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Savior to Thee my all I now surrender
Thine altogether - Thine alone to be
For Thou hast ransomed
Purchased and redeemed me
With Thy heart's blood
Upon th'accursed tree

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To pay my debt I see Thee
Bruised and bleeding
The spotless Lamb
To bear my sin and shame
O Savior long
Have I withstood Thy pleading
Too long witheld
From Thee Thy lawful claim

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Take all I have
My life - my health - my talents
And consecrate them
To Thy service sweet
'Twas from Thy hand they came
Behold I lay them
A grateful tribute
At Thy sacred feet

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Oh teach me how
To tell the wondrous story
Of Thy great love
To sinners far and wide
To live - to speak - to labor
For Thy glory
The glory of a Savior crucified
